custom-meta.meta-value: Patient data are protected by the China CDC and are unsuitable for public sharing. The HFRS data is not allowed to be publicly shared due to local infection disease law. Interested parties can apply for the data by contacting the Data-center of China Public Health Science ( http://www.phsciencedata.cn/Share/ky_sjml.jsp?id=59761d3e-ca3c-4c65-a6a5-67be1d2fb692) or email data@chinacdc.cn.
